In other news, water to be less wet.

I know this bug is not something that you will do everyday.  But it did 
uncover something severe.  I am logging this only to help you guys.  Severity 
is major but the priority of this bug is low.  (major, P4)

Let me know if you don't want these bugs logged.

Oh we do.  I'm sorry if my comment came off snarky, I was reading fark.com at
the time.  :)  We are definitly aiming to address problems such as this.
fark.com?  Maybe I should read that too ;-)

I do not believe there's anything we can do about this, at least in the scope of any one bug.  The intent behind this bug is covered every release when we do a performance pass.  I'm going to mark this as WONTFIX but please don't think this is something we've forgotten about it - we devout a good hunk of time every release to making bugs like this go away.
